thread.title: Spurs-Hawks live chat and Periscope
thread.title_full: Spurs-Hawks live chat and Periscope - San Antonio Express-News

author: Jabari Young
title: Spurs-Hawks live chat and Periscope
text:
Photo: San Antonio Express-News Image 1 of / 1 1 Spurs' Tony Parker (09) splits the defense of Atlanta Hawks' Mike Scott (32) and Kent Bazemore (24) at the AT&T Center on Wednesday, Nov. 5, 2014. (Kin Man Hui/San Antonio Express-News)
Photo: San Antonio Express-News Spurs' Tony Parker (09) splits the defense of Atlanta Hawks' Mike... Spurs-Hawks live chat and Periscope 1 / 1 Back to Gallery Join Express-News Spurs beat writer Jabari Young Wednesday at noon as the five-time NBA champions prepare for to take on the Atlanta Hawks at 7 p.m.
Leave your questions in the comments below at tweet @JabariJYoung leading up to and during the chat.
This will also be a special Periscope edition, so look for the link before the chat official begins.
Going forward, one of the Express-News' handful of Spurs beat reporters — Jeff McDonald, Dan McCarney, Mike Monroe, Tom Orsborn and Jabari Young — will be on hand to answer any and all Spurs-related questions you may have.
Along with the chats, follow the reporters on Twitter, read them daily in the Express-News and at MySA.com and Express-News.com and subscribe to the new weekly Spurs Nation magazine.
Click here to get your Spurs Nation subscription before the season starts, or call 855-654-1470.
